name: The Bell Will Always Ring For You!!
text: Main: Look at the top 5 cards of your deck; reveal up to 2 {Shandian Warrior} type Character cards or [Mont Blanc Noland] and add them to your hand. Then, put the rest at the bottom of your deck in any order.
